message.body: Sorry we had some weird communication today, I wasn't in the best mood somehow. I appreciate so much all that you do for the show, you're amazing, thank you
I think that type of thing can be avoided if we try to have weekly checkins
Thanks lois, and no worries. I would love to start weekly check ins. Ill be free wed, thurs, fri evening and fridays my last day at work, after next week i am full time cabaret bandleader for a while
